original_text: Now about eight days after these sayings he took with him Peter and John and James and went up on the mountain to pray.
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하신 후 팔 일쯤 되어 예수께서 베드로와 요한과 야고보를 데리고 기도하시러 산에 올라가사

sentences.original_text: Now about eight days after these sayings
sentences.korean_translation: 이 말씀들을 하신 지 약 팔 일 후에

sentences.original_text: he took with him Peter and John and James
and went up on the mountain
